mapper.select: select user_no from user_tbl where user_email=#{userEmail}
select count(*) from order_pay join user_tbl using(user_email) where user_nick = #{userNick}
select order_no, user_email,product_no,people,price,product_name,user_nick,product_thumb from order_pay join product using(product_no) join user_tbl using(user_email) where user_nick = #{userNick}

select p.product_writer, p.product_no, o.people, o.price, o.order_date, to_char(o.start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_date, to_char(o.end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_date, p.product_name, seller.user_nick as seller_nick, seller.user_phone as seller_phone, buyer.user_name as buyer_name, buyer.user_phone as buyer_phone, p.product_thumb, o.user_email, o.payment_type, o.order_no from order_pay o join product p on o.product_no = p.product_no join user_tbl seller on p.product_writer = seller.user_email join user_tbl buyer on o.user_email = buyer.user_email where o.order_no = #{orderNo}
select count(*) from order_pay o join product p using(product_no) join user_tbl u on(p.product_writer = u.user_email) where user_nick = #{userNick}
select order_no,order_date,product_name,user_nick as seller_nick from order_pay o join product p using(product_no) join user_tbl u on(p.product_writer = u.user_email) where user_nick= #{userNick}
